Reviews.Content: stayed nights post cruise 14th – 16th 2010 extremely pleased cruise company’s choice arrived coach ample below ground car parking elegantly furnished dark wood ample wardrobe drawer space king size bed comfortable mattress top quality bed linen table radio alarm clock cordless phone light desk chair phone desk lamp inbuilt computer power network jack lead circular dining table lamp comfortable upholstered armchairs nice perch bed armoire spacious drawers tv dvd player region 1 plenty literature city cupboard containing mini bar light coffeetea ice bucket ice hall builtin wardrobe free safe iron board plus bathrobes umbrella luggage rack padded upholstered stool bathroom bath shower phone top quality toiletries soft towels hair dryer mirror wash free standing lit makeup mirror set scales – handy weighing luggage probably yourself week cruise criticism idea length mirror door opposite toilet decor ambience pleasant staff friendly attentive main restaurant meals adjoining gerard lounge excellent priced nights week allyoucaneat chocolate buffet wifi expensive laptop starbucks street wifi coffee food market corner street major shops including sears bay easy walking distance hotel situated downtown vancouver short visit trolley stop opposite hopon hopoff bus stop corner robson street 38 24 hour ticket city short time recommend hopping harbour cruise stanley park found vancouver wonderful city weather 68 degrees visit enhanced sutton experience

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: CookieM0nster
Reviews.Content: please aware stayed december 2008 current view hotel stayed hotel clean looks street im 2 3 star traveller little uncomfortable mainly insecurity wearing casual clothing hotel attract fairly wealthy people people hotwire cheap rates decor guess thats hotels stayed standard queen bed fair sized bathroom restaurant nice decided try eating deal highly recommend location

Reviews.Title: “Refined European luxury, very comfortable and very well kept.”
Reviews.Author: DaveKay40
Reviews.Content: excellent property location staff accomodating pleasant depending rate pay wifi service 2010 luxury property wifi complimentary policy changed mentioned front desk low hotel chains offer free wifi response attract people stay hardly acceptable sensible answer remove charges bill lot offer free wifi begin cut cat mouse games allinall property highly recommended definitely stay heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased with this spacious and comfortable room”
Reviews.Author: EMOESQ
Reviews.Content: bad hotel usually stay 4star disappoint suite separate bedrooms bathrooms living dining modern apartment homey walking distance local attractions restaurant

Reviews.Title: “Nice but not 5 star”
Reviews.Author: dancer45
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hotwire 19900 downtown vancouver deal hotelscom etc booking hotels downtown weekday stay hotwire advertises hotel 5 star 4 star plus hotel lovely facade elegant lobby 24hr concierge service unusual service night didnt chance check fitness facilities pool standard king bed window faced residential street facing balcony condos quiet bathroom pleasant surprise free standing tub separate shower stall lot counter space amenities fine gilchrist soames line 4 star hotel decor facelift wasnt bad read previous reviews agree bed low ground looks box spring missing hard era pillow menus etc hampton inns strange standard pillows bed bed bedding plush 5 star airconditioning bit noisy husband likes white noise sleep wasnt issue real reason stay location fabulous corner robson shopping restaruants gas town short walk hill water reviews complained nickled dimed regards valet etc staying 4 hotel involves tipping taxes sometimes facility fee valet parking youre getting rate hotel stay cost

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stay - Great classic hotel - Central location”
Reviews.Author: BluMartini
Reviews.Content: am fan decor professional efficient service hotel makes lack personality hotel tend bit maintained fitness centre major facelift location

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy at night”
Reviews.Author: somelo
Reviews.Content: nice hotel 5 star staff service excellent doubt amenities mediocre bathrooms dated hear noises walls windows thin preventing nights sleep hear ambulances cops honking night

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - stay in the Grand Residence Suites”
Reviews.Author: PatrickDevitt
Reviews.Content: perfect base explore vancouver daughter loved pool staff super friendly grand residence suites idea size lounge sofa bed huge tv bed comfortable kitchen little size watch local telephone charges 150 real critisim lack free wifi charging 15 day excessive

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic accommodation in the heart of vancouver”
Reviews.Author: travellinalbertan
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed residence tower weekend happy hotel apartment seperate living bedroom kitchen beds super comfortable wonderful sleeps liked amenities hotelthe pool steam spa location excellent

Reviews.Title: “Well located but overrated as five star”
Reviews.Author: Pentwater--summerjoy
Reviews.Content: pros available hotwire located near city center nice amenities including nice pool views city scads doormen stand staff feel cons double beds try nickel dime death exchange rate especially ridiculous 35night parking charge avoided feeding meters streets day 7 pm moving car spots front hotel parking free 10 pm 9 am

Reviews.Title: “Solid Hotel in an EXCELLENT location”
Reviews.Author: EARWashingtonDC
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hotwire 125 night deal unlike booked hotwire basic flat screen otherwise standard hotel appointed hotel stellar location walk downtown vancouver close restaurants robson street excellent restaurants door multiple starbucks supermarket throwing distance plus japadog front note business center minibar price internet access business center 6 twenty minutes little steep experience par course unless staying lower property catering business travel homewood suites holiday inn express anyway money excellent value location location location

Reviews.Title: “Very fine hotel, central location, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Harmiclir
Reviews.Content: nicely appointed hotel comfortable elegant wonderfully friendly service convenient downtown close access public transit walking distance sights neighborhoods rate service provided quality excellent supermarket street

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Location with Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: QuinteGrp
Reviews.Content: picked location heart vancouver checkin quick courteous suite appointed excellent view weather unseasonably cool cant blame hotel restaurant little pricey food service excellent suite 12th floor nice size 700 sq ft definitely expensive hotels worth opinion staff helpful questions recommend

Reviews.Title: “Be prepared to be nickled and dimed to death!”
Reviews.Author: world-is-my-osyter
Reviews.Content: stayed night reservations hot wire hotel beautiful staff friendly courteous nice opinion highly rated led believe draperies dirty furniture dusty jumble electrical cords hanging desk windows fixtures dirty splatters paint fan bathroom array snacks liqueur offered exorbitant price coffee pot complementary tea coffee microwave heat water wifes tea pour cups coffee time started drink cup tea cold luck microwave fridge crammed brim items sale absolutely brought included amenities included price internet youll pay business center youll pay 30 night valet parking expensive hotel ive stayed vancouver hotwire informed parking charge hotel politely offers self parking rate valets hotel dirty unmaintained hotwire price makes deal summery hotels vancouver larger cleaner included amenities low cost free parking dont wrong love vancouver course wont using hotwire staying sutton

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, lovely staff”
Reviews.Author: TrishQ_10
Reviews.Content: stayed sutton christmas extended vacation canada united hotel staff fantastic helpful concierges stay memorable hotel decorated christmas trees reception beautiful gerard lounge relax sightseeing shopping cosy welcoming service class spacious comfortable kitchen travelling family 4 marketplace supermarket street location unbeatable heart city found able walk due convenient location stayed hotels hotel stayed wonderful staff location thoroughly recommend hotel cant wait stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - central to everything”
Reviews.Author: bigbaglady
Reviews.Content: location pretty convenient step outside walking distance restaurants stores etc central hotel maintained clean spacious serviced daily lobby conference pretty nice hotel staff friendly accommodating definitely stay
